snippet: The foundation set up by Daniel Ellsberg, the Pentagon Papers leaker and a supporter of Edward J. Snowden, encourages publishing government secrets in the public interest.
abstract: Edward J Snowden is joining board of Freedom of the Press Foundation, nonprofit organization co-founded by Daniel Ellsberg, well-known leaker of the Pentagon Papers during the Vietnam War.
lead_paragraph: The foundation set up by Daniel Ellsberg, the Pentagon Papers leaker and a supporter of Edward J. Snowden, encourages publishing government secrets in the public interest.

headline.main: Snowden to Join Board of the Freedom of the Press Foundation
headline.print_headline: Snowden Joins Board of Press Group Founded by Daniel Ellsberg
